message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer leaves us both with a good amount.
Let's try a bit more in my favor, still quite fair!
Bob, my turn to propose something more realistic.  Time is ticking and we both lose if this keeps going.
Meeting you halfway between my last offer and your last offer, compromise?
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  An even split is the only fair solution.  Take it or we both lose!
